name: 《古斯塔奥：帝国重生》Gustavo Kingdom Rebirth
description: The story is mainly about the Gustavo empire. It is an empire ruled by women. After the death of the queen of the previous generation, Princess Nali, who should have succeeded to the throne, was arrested by her sister and exiled to the border of the Gustavo Empire. The player will play the heroine Nali.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 8 10 Processor: Intel® Core ™ i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7 8 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 Storage: 4 GB available space
